jobs.name: Apple
jobs.job_description: Backend Development - Making the features that Apple users love (like Siri) work by presenting data to the user-facing applications.
qualifications: Proficiency in one or more of the following developer skills: Java, C/C++, PHP, Python, Ruby, Unix, MySQL, Clojure, Scala, Java Script, CSS, HTML5
Experience with web frameworks such as AngularJS, NodeJS, SproutCore
Experience in sophisticated methodologies such as Data Modeling, Validation, Processing, Hadoop, MapReduce, Mongo, Pig
jobs.benefits: $1,000 / mo housing, 25% off apple products, health/vision/dental insurance.
